_comment_HOST_PORT: Proxy server address - also serves as Web UI access address (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:3456)
_comment_APIKEY: Authentication key for Claude Code (ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN) - also used as Web UI password
_comment_token_in: Optional: token_in field can be added to providers. Leave empty (or omit) for auto passthrough mode. Use 'header', 'query', or 'both' to override.
_comment: 后期如果cherry studio等客户端无法使用(某些站点进行检测限制时),则根据正常的日志,增加这里的覆写项即可
